weave.config

Class DataConfig

  • java.lang.Object
    • weave.config.DataConfig

  • public class DataConfig
extends java.lang.Object
    DatabaseConfig This class reads from an SQL database and provides an interface to retrieve strings.
    Author:
    Philip Kovac, Andy Dufilie

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  DataConfig.DataEntity
      This class contains metadata for an attributeColumn entry.
      static class  DataConfig.DataEntityMetadata
      This class contains public and private metadata for an entity.
      static class  DataConfig.DataEntityWithRelationships 
      static class  DataConfig.DataType 
      static class  DataConfig.EntityHierarchyInfo 
      static class  DataConfig.EntityType 
      static class  DataConfig.PrivateMetadata 
      static class  DataConfig.PublicMetadata 
      static class  DataConfig.Relationship
      Represents a parent-child relationship between two entities.
      static class  DataConfig.RelationshipList
      An ordered List of Relationship objects which adds two functions: getChildIds() and getParentIds().

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static int MAX_ENTITY_REQUEST_COUNT
      This is a recommended maximum number of entities a remote user should be able to request at a time.

      • newEntity

        public int newEntity(DataConfig.DataEntityMetadata properties,
            int parent_id,
            int insert_at_index)
              throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Creates a new entity and adds it as a child of another entity.
        Parameters:
        properties - Metadata for the new entity.
        parent_id - The ID of the parent entity to which the new entity should be added as a child, or NULL for no parent.
        insert_at_index - The new entity's child index, or NULL to add it to the end.
        Returns:
        The new entity's ID.
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException

      • searchPublicMetadata

        public java.util.Collection<java.lang.Integer> searchPublicMetadata(java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> publicMetadata,
                                                           java.lang.String[] wildcardFields)
                                                             throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Gets an Array of entity IDs with matching public metadata.
        Parameters:
        publicMetadata - Public metadata to search for.
        wildcardFields - A list of field names in publicMetadata that should be treated as search strings with wildcards '?' and '*' for single-character and multi-character matching, respectively.
        Returns:
        An Array of IDs matching the search criteria.
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException

      • buildHierarchy

        public java.util.Collection<java.lang.Integer> buildHierarchy(int parentId,
                                                     int childId,
                                                     int insertAtIndex)
                                                       throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Adds a copy of an existing child to a parent.
        Parameters:
        parentId - An existing parent to add a child hierarchy to.
        childId - An existing child to copy the hierarchy of.
        insertAtIndex - Identifies a child of the parent to insert the new child before.
        Returns:
        A collection of IDs whose relationships have changed as a result of modifying the hierarchy.
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException

      • getParentIds

        public java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> getParentIds(int id)
                                               throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Shortcut for getRelationships(Arrays.asList(id)).getParentIds(id). If you need this information for multiple IDs, use getRelationships() instead.
